title: Live Resin Terpenes
description: Extracted from freshly harvested cannabis, preserving the plant's natural aroma and potential medicinal properties in concentrated form

title: Medical Terpenes
description: Nature's aromatic compounds, potentially offering therapeutic benefits in medicine through their chemical profiles.

title: Ultra Candy Terpenes
description: A sweet and aromatic blend reminiscent of sugary confections, offering a delightful sensory experience and potential therapeutic effects in cannabis products.

title: Sauce Terps
description: Concentrated extracts known for their intense flavor profiles and potent aromas, available in a range of purity and aroma suited to cannabis products.

title: Isolates
description: Pure compounds extracted from plants, offering precise dosing and targeted effects. Ideal for medicinal applications and product customization in various industries.
